text: Agar ʙarojason mahre muajjan kardaed va pes az nazdiki taloqason megued, nisfi on ci muqarrar kardaed, ʙipardozed; magar on ki eson xud jo kase, ki aqdi nikoh ʙa dasti ust, onro ʙuʙaxsad.
